Greetings. I am Ramazan, your developer guide. 

You have initialized the "Baseline Engine Tour". Note: This is not a game in the traditional sense. It is a technical demonstration of the `baseline_engine` capabilities. 

Right now, you are reading text defined in the `intro.json` file. The engine looks for this specific file to begin any story. 

Every node in this tour includes a `help` command. Try it if you get stuck, or just to see how we handle global assistance.
text_revisit: You have returned to the `intro` node. The engine uses the `text_revisit` property to display this shorter message instead of the full introduction.
